Package io.micronaut.security.oauth2.openid.providers

Open ID Provider specific classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Auth0EndSessionEndpointConfiguration
    Provides specific configuration to logout from Auth0.
    Auth0OpenidConfigurationCondition
    Condition which evaluates to true if micronaut.security.oauth2.issuer contains auth0.
    AwsCognitoAuthMethodProvider
    Provides authentication method for token endpoint and AWS Cognito.
    AwsCognitoEndSessionEndpointConfiguration
    Provides specific configuration to logout from AWS Cognito.
    AwsCognitoOpenidConfigurationCondition
    Condition which evaluates to true if micronaut.security.oauth2.issuer contains cognito.
    OktaEndSessionEndpointConfiguration
    Provides specific configuration to logout from Okta.
    OktaOpenidConfigurationCondition
    Condition which evaluates to true if micronaut.security.oauth2.issuer contains okta.
    OpenidConfigurationCondition
    Abstract Condition to check if micronaut.security.oauth2.issuer contains a search sequence.

Package io.micronaut.security.oauth2.openid.providers Description

Open ID Provider specific classes.
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Sergio del Amo
